Subject: Re: When Titans collide
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron turns around, and looks at the Bodicons. He smiles, at their want
to spread destruction. That's what he wanted. Motormaster walked by with
Wildrider, and was about to leave, when Megatron addressed him.
"Motormaster, what were you in the middle of doing when I arrived here?" he
questioned. "Why, we were looking for you mighty Megatron. You and the
other Decepticons." Megatron thought. Yes, he wanted some of them back,
"They would be on the Ark, right" he said. Motormaster responded. "That's
what we gathered, but when we got there the Maximals stopped us." Megatron
gave him a solution. "Then, we will have to eliminate them from the
equation. Bodicons, go and bring in the metal that Astroblast unloaded. In
a bit I will have a mission for you." he said, and walked towards the
computer screen. "Computer, open up all info on the Maximals."



OOC: Would it be moding for Megatron to read about Iron Raptor, and the others?
